overview: All-eyed woman, kuchisake-onna, zombie woman, flat woman. Catch the famous youkai and get rid of them with a proud meat stick, their name is Ghost ero Busters. Surround the youkai with a piece of white bread, and first remove the evil lurking in their bodies with fingering. Then, he sucks three or four meat sticks and invites him to the Buddhahood with a hard FUCK that is said to disperse evil spirits.
title: Ghost Ero Busters
